mdq:check.name: Dataset Landing Page Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a dataset landing page exists and is resolvable.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar import metadig.checks as checks
displayLength = 20 # A resource format is not present if 'resourceDistributionLandingPage' not in globals() or resourceDistributionLandingPage is None: output = "A resource distribution information url was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(resourceDistributionLandingPage)): output = "The resource distribution information url is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if variable type is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(resourceDistributionLandingPage, str) or isinstance(resourceDistributionLandingPage, unicode)): output = "The resource distribution information url '{}' was found".format(resourceDistributionLandingPage) url = resourceDistributionLandingPage.strip() elif (isinstance(resourceDistributionLandingPage, ArrayList)): output = "The resource distribution information url '{}' was found (first of {} urls)".format(resourceDistributionLandingPage[0].strip(), resourceDistributionLandingPage.size()) url = resourceDistributionLandingPage[0].strip() else: output = "The resource distribution information url '{}' was found)".format(resourceDistributionLandingPage) url = resourceDistributionLandingPage.strip()
resolvable, msg = checks.isResolvable(url) if (resolvable): output = '{} and is resolvable.'.format(output) status = "SUCCESS" return True else: output = "{}, but is not resolvable: {}".format(output, msg) status = "FAILURE" return False
